acrg_MOZART module¶

File to read in standard MOZART output file Output will contain the timestamp, lat, lon, surface emissions and concentrations If you want any other fields then you’ll need to add them in

import acrg_MOZART as mozart data=mozart.read(‘filename’) print data.time

Can also extract data for sites given lats and lons sitefile = a text file with the site acronym, lat and then lon separated by spaces or tabs

import acrg_MOZART as mozart data=mozart.filter(‘filename’, ‘sitefile’)
